skillTree.localised_description: Few magics can worm their way through this one's skull; their Khornate collar offers adequate protection, as does the impenetrable, relentless fury infecting his mind.
At times, this servant of Khorne storms across the battlefield with arrows lodged in his chest. However, they seem to do little but further stoke the raging fire of his wrath.
Fluttering and flouncing into battle is the way of the weak and self-indulgent. War should be waged Kharneth's way – with pure, unbridled savagery.

effects.description: Melee attack: +10 when fighting against Slaaneshi factions
Weapon strength: +15% when fighting against Slaaneshi factions

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +20%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +35%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +50%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: One of the gifts of Khorne to his favoured son was the ability to change his form to chaotic iron, all but impenetrable to weapons or magic.
The more that Kaarn slays, the more fury and power he puts into every stroke, but the less care he puts into skill at arms.
The vile deaths of so many bubble forth from Kaarn's form, toxic heme eating away at any who stand near.
An offering to Khorne, created from the flesh of the slain, and dedicated by Kaarn the Vanquisher, this strange shrine strengthens all those who fight by his side.
Kaarn has slaughtered so many of his own forces that few mortals will stand at his side. Daemons, however, are far less squeamish about the thought of falling in battle.

effects.description:
Attribute: Perfect Vigour for Bloodletters of Khorne and Exalted Bloodletters of Khorne units
	(all units in army)

related_attributes.bullet_text: Even when performing the most fatiguing actions, this unit never loses vigour.

effects.description:
Attribute: Perfect Vigour for Bloodcrushers of Khorne units
	(all units in army)

related_attributes.bullet_text: Even when performing the most fatiguing actions, this unit never loses vigour.

skillTree.localised_description: Kaarn can call forth all the blood and carnage at Khorne's fingertips, bathing the entire battlefield in a red and furious glow.

attributes.bullet_text:
A Rampaging unit is uncontrollable and will attack the nearest enemy unit.
	When there are no enemy units nearby, a Rampaging unit will move around randomly instead.

skillTree.localised_description: When a huge swathe of rage and violence descends upon the unready, very few survivors are left in its wake.
No foe remains a threat once torn limb from bloody limb!
"KILL! KILL THEM ALL!"
"Raze it all to the ground! Leave nothing standing!"
With every other thought squeezed from their mind, there is naught left of this one but the screaming song of slaughter.
Death, malice, butchery and murder – the enemies of Khorne shall have it all.
"None shall run far! None shall be able to hide! All will come to sufferance!"
"Modulistic terror – a vast, sadistic feast. The only way to exit is going piece by piece."
All will know agony, pulverised by the inescapable grip of the Blood God's hatred.
There are Lords that radiate power, confidence and fear, inspiring their followers to great or terrible acts.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +75
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: The Feet of Khorne march across the corpses of their enemies, as the Teeth of Death crush the life from those yet to die.

skillTree.localised_description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.
"You will serve me, wretch, or you will die, there is no other option."
This Khornate Lord's well of eternal rage never runs dry, nor does the ceaseless influx of warriors eager to serve under his command.
To despoil, to corrupt and ruin, to break the mortals and take their gods from them - this is what Chaos wants.
With the servants of Chaos comes the corruption – as the landscape twists, this one speeds the transformation.
This willing servant of the Ruinous Powers has a resilience that is beyond any mortal measure.

effects.description: Casualty replenishment rate: +30% for this Lord

skillTree.localised_description: "The time to strike is now!"

effects.description: Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present

skillTree.localised_description: There is no stopping this one's slaughter, for they are driven by the unquenchable lust for battle.
Battles can be lost, but can the war ever really be won? The advance of Ruin can never truly be halted once and for all.

effects.description:
Attrition: -10% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

Attrition: -20% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

Attrition: -30% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Every skull taken in the Blood God's honour proves this one's loyalty to the Skull Throne.
This brutal Lord of Khorne decimates the lands of man and monster alike – the avatar or wrath incarnate!

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.

Daemonic units cannot be routed, but take damage when their Leadership is low.
	
	Daemonic units also have:
	Physical Resistance
	 Fear and Terror Immunity
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.

effects.description: Casualty replenishment rate: +10% for Khorne Daemon units

backgroundSkills.localised_description: All who have stood before him, be they fried or foe, have died to the swings of Kaarn's mighty axes. He is subject to none besides Khorne, and all die who cross his path.

effects.description:
Skulls gained from kills: +30%
	(all units in army)

Charge bonus: +10 for Bloodletters of Khorne, Exalted Bloodletters of Khorne and Bloodcrushers of Khorne units
	(all units in army)
